channel.title: Comments on: Jetsam
channel.description: Scattered pages from an apocryphal diary

item.title: By: Monica
item.dc:creator: Monica
item.description:
If you know you have to post, the ideas will come. If you tell yourself you don't have to, they will stay in bed and snooze....
Also, if it's taking too long to make, simplify.
And finally, maybe rather than letting the spirit flow, you're worried about whether or not they are perfect...
If you need some guilt to help, thinking about the poor starving artists who read your blog who would have no images/words to eat without you:)
item.content:encoded:
If you know you have to post, the ideas will come. If you tell yourself you don’t have to, they will stay in bed and snooze….

Also, if it’s taking too long to make, simplify.

And finally, maybe rather than letting the spirit flow, you’re worried about whether or not they are perfect…

If you need some guilt to help, thinking about the poor starving artists who read your blog who would have no images/words to eat without you:)

item.title: By: Drey
item.dc:creator: Drey
item.description: Glad you like it. I have a few ideas, but it takes a while to make each strip.
item.content:encoded: Glad you like it. I have a few ideas, but it takes a while to make each strip.

item.title: By: jenny
item.dc:creator: jenny
item.description: and i love the purple dinosaur-looking dream guy in the earlier comics. and the lucid with the hula hoop.
item.content:encoded: and i love the purple dinosaur-looking dream guy in the earlier comics. and the lucid with the hula hoop.

item.title: By: jenny
item.dc:creator: jenny
item.description: please don't let this be a long sabbatical. the comic is so cool.
item.content:encoded: please don’t let this be a long sabbatical. the comic is so cool.
